name: src/backend/com.js
send
description: Sends data to main process and frontend (backend window)

name: src/backend/files.js
directory
description: Checks if main program directory exists, if it doesn't it creates it (backend window)

params.name: relPath
params.description: Relative path to parent directory of the file

params.name: relPath
params.description: Relative path to parent directory of the file

params.name: data
params.description: Content which will be saved to file

name: src/backend/main.js
checkArg
description: Checks argument sended from backend (backend window)

params.name: mode
params.description: If it's true, it will parse JSON to Object or Array, if it's false it will stringify Object or Array to JSON

return.description: if mode is set to true {object}, if mode is set to false {string}

name: src/backend/requires.js
src/frontend/com.js
send
description: Sends data to main process and backend (frontend window)
examples:
<JavaScript>
send('data');
send({task:'save', data: 'data', name:'file.json', path:'relative/path/to/parent/folder'});
send({task:'read', name:'file.json', path:'relative/path/to/parent/folder'});

name: src/frontend/lang.js
lang
description: Contains all strings used in programs

name: changeLang
description: Changes content of {@link lang} and {@link incomesCategories} based on loaded laguage

name: src/frontend/main.js
saveAll
description: Saves all informations about budget and config (frontend)

name: resetMonthToDefault
description: Sets month, incomes and outcomes data to default values

name: updateMonth
description: Updates month data, and saves incomes, outcomes and month data

name: checkArg
description: Checks argument sended from backend (frontend window)

params.name: arg
params.description: argument from communication channel to check

params.name: arg
params.description: Determines what needs to be loaded (called by checkArg) (frontend window)

name: fullDateAndHour
description: Returns date and hour in format: DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM:SS

name: loadMonth
description: Loads month, incomes and outcomes data

name: showMonth
description: Sets {@link historyCheck} depending on the ID of month data and runs {@link loadMonth}

name: delIncome
description: Deletes 1 income or outcome based on id

params.name: type
params.description: "income" or "outcome", determines which type function will delete

name: addIncome
description: Add an income or an outcome

params.name: name
params.description: Name / title of income or outcome

name: src/frontend/requires.js
src/frontend/ui.js
menuPos
description: Changes position of menu on the left

name: generateIncomesForm
description: Generates form used for adding Incomes

name: generateOutcomesForm
description: Generates form used for adding Outcomes

params.name: scheme
params.description: determines which buttons needs be displayed: 'incomes',

name: contextIncomesAmount
description: Displays month amount on app bar

name: generateMainMenu
description: Generates content of left side manu

content:
# YourHomeBudget
This program is designed for simple home budget management
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "YourHomeBudget",
  "productName": "YourHomeBudget",
  "version": "0.1.1b",
  "author": {
    "name": "Damian Epat Kusmierz",
    "email": "kamikadze2185@gmail.com"
  },
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "category": "Utility",
  "description": "Simple home budget manager",
  "icon": "res\\ico\\512x512.png",
  "build": {
    "asar": false,
    "linux": {
      "target": "deb",
      "category": "Utility"
    }
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "accessibility-developer-tools": "^2.12.0",
    "concat-stream": "^1.6.0",
    "devtron": "^1.4.0",
    "electron": "^1.7.5",
    "electron-builder": "^19.49.0",
    "extract-zip": "^1.6.6",
    "fd-slicer": "^1.0.1",
    "file-match": "^1.0.2",
    "file-system": "^2.2.2",
    "fs-extra": "^4.0.2",
    "highlight.js": "^9.12.0",
    "humanize-plus": "^1.8.2",
    "load-grunt-tasks": "^3.5.2",
    "stylelint": "^8.2.0",
    "stylelint-config-recommended": "^1.0.0",
    "utils-extend": "^1.0.8",
    "yauzl": "^2.9.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "devtron": "^1.4.0",
    "electron-squirrel-startup": "^1.0.0",
    "electron-titlebar": "^0.0.3",
    "file-match": "^1.0.2",
    "file-system": "^2.2.2",
    "fs-extra": "^4.0.2"
  }
}
name: package.json
